definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

sentences.english: They are excellent neighbours to you in the country, I understand.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說，他們是你們的好鄉鄰。

sentences.english: The traditional neighboring friendship is in some degree helpful to the development of community work.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的鄉鄰之誼在一定意義上有助於社區工作的展開。

sentences.english: Because my mother works alone in this valley, so she can't ask the neighbors for help.
sentences.chinese: 因爲這是母親獨自幹活的峽谷，沒法兒去托賴衆鄉鄰。

sentences.english: Pretty soon all the local people knew that Xue Qingguan was looking just like a goat.
sentences.chinese: 很快，所有的鄉鄰都知道了薛慶觀長得像山羊。

definition: to dispatch troops/to send an army/to mobilize forces
to bewail one's poverty/to complain about being hard up/to pretend to be poor
a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom); everything has its ancestral home/In old age, an expatriate longs to return home.
to hold a lamp/to light a lamp
(literary) (of a married woman) to visit one's parents
old variant of 補缺|补缺[bu3 que1]
the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence
